creator: gregor@apache.org
text: *** Bug 29118 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
from 29118:

a lot of the ant tasks in lenya do not make sense and should be refactored into
classes. for instance, the save-meta-data ant task has to be redefined for every
publication (in config/tasks/targets.xml)

while ant has advantages for quickly whipping up tasks (say for exporting
content) it should not be a core part of lenya. we need to find a way to get rid
of these ant tasks while still allowing for easy customization / scripting.
